name: cucumber-playwright
description: Starter project to write and debug cucumber-js features with Playwright

scripts.build: rimraf build && npm run format && npm run lint && tsc && npm run cucumber-check
scripts.cucumber-check: cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --dry-run --require env/set-environment-variables.ts --require world/custom-world.ts --require step-definitions/**/*.ts --require hooks/**/*.ts  --require-module ts-node/register --format-options "{\"snippetInterface\": \"async-await\"}" --format summary --format progress --format progress-bar  --publish-quiet

author: Saravanan
